article_title: Tata Steel Ltd. Swings to Loss
article_text:
NEW DELHI—Tata Steel Ltd. slipped to a loss last quarter as overseas demand for steel weakened and cheap imports hurt domestic prices.

The company posted a loss of 56.74 billion rupees ($889.6 million) in the three months ended March 31, compared with a profit of 10.36 billion rupees a year earlier. Total revenue fell about 21% to 333.37 billion rupees. The average forecast of two brokerages polled by The Wall Street Journal was for a...
